participant_2.background:
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
I love kids and dogs, but I could never be a teacher if I were blind.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I enjoy reading books to distract myself from pain.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Pretty good! Just got done with a long run, about to eat some tacos and then head to my girlfriend's place.
Sounds fun, I just got home from playing hockey.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to try hockey.
It's really fun, but it can be dangerous.
What are some of the dangers of hockey?
Well, you can get hit with a puck or stick, and there's a lot of physical contact.
Oh, that sounds like it could be scary.
It can be, but it's also a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is. I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and have some fun.
Thanks for the suggestion, I'll look into it.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, exercise, and spend time with my girlfriend.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read too.
What's your favorite book?
I have a lot of favorite books, but one of my favorites is "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."
Oh, I've heard of that one! I've been meaning to read it.
You should! It's a really funny book.
Thanks for the recommendation. I'll check it out.
No problem
